short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flappy Bird Unblocked Game is a classic arcade game

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Flappy Bird Unblocked Game is a classic arcade game where you control a bird as it flies through a series of pipes. The game is simple to learn but difficult to master, and it's perfect for playing in short bursts.

This extension allows you to play Flappy Bird even when you're at school or work, where games are usually blocked. The extension also includes a number of features that make the game more fun, such as:

Unblocked: You can play the game even when it's blocked at school or work.
Fullscreen: Play the game in full screen mode for a more immersive experience.
Leaderboards: Compare your scores to other players around the world.
Download the Flappy Bird Unblocked Game extension today and start flapping!

Here are some additional details that you might want to include in the description:

The extension is compatible with Chrome on Windows, Mac, Linux, and Chromebook.
The extension is free to download and use.
There are no ads or in-app purchases.
I hope this helps!

Highlight the addictive gameplay of Flappy Bird. The game is simple but challenging, and it's easy to get sucked in for hours on end.
